Blessed Shot.name: Blessed Shot
Blessed Shot.flavor: You utter a quick prayer to your deity, and charge your projectile with holy energy.
Blessed Shot.onHit: 3[W] + Wisdom modifier + Dexterity modifier radiant damage.

Divine Veil.name: Divine Veil
Divine Veil.flavor: While you incant the name of your deity, a burst of glittering light masks you and your allies from view.
Divine Veil.target: You and each ally in the burst
Divine Veil.effect: Each target can spend a healing surge. In addition, each ally can select one target; that ally gains total concealment from that enemy until the end of your next turn, and the ally can make an immediate Stealth check as a free action to hide from that target.

Holy Barrage.name: Holy Barrage
Holy Barrage.flavor: You launch a hail of projectiles at multiple foes, all charged with divine energy.
Holy Barrage.target: Each enemy in the burst you can see
Holy Barrage.effect: One ally within 5 squares of you can spend a healing surge, gain a +2 bonus to all defenses until the end of your next turn, or gain regeneration 5 until the end of the encounter (allyâ€™s choice).
